sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import Button from "./button"; import Form from "./Form.js"; import { useState } from "react"; import Table from "./Table.js"; export const UpdateForm = ({ addDataToTable, tableData }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ customer_name: "", email: "" }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; // Inside your UpdateForm component const handleSubmit = (e) => { // e.preventDefault(); addDataToTable(formData); // Call the function to add data to the table setFormData({ customer_name: "", email: "" }); // Clear the form fields }; return (
